column1: Little Goat Diner////In terms of food
column2: we started off with the goat chili which was absolutely delicious! Perfect for a cold winter day! My boyfriend ordered the patty melt which came with caramelized onions
column4: cheese and a special sauce on two slices of toast. Definitely a worth while grilled cheese burger. I went with the los drowned
column5: which is one of their top sellers. It's basically a sandwich with braised beef which I was not a fan of. The meet itself was too chewy.
